title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using Photon, the popup menu in the java editor ruler is not appearing.
OB: When I open a java editor and right click on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu is displayed.
EB: I expect that when I right click on the left vertical ruler in the java editor, a menu should pop up with options to add breakpoints and marks.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1) Open a java editor. 2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. The popup menu should appear, but it is not.
